tool_description: Aspose.Slides Cloud is a REST based API which allows you to read, edit and convert PowerPoint documents in the cloud. You can convert PowerPoint documents into various other formats like TIFF, PDF, PPTX, XPS and PPT etc. You can extract the contents like text and images from the PowerPoint documents.
name: Aspose.Slides Cloud
title: Aspose.Slides Cloud

api_list.name: GetSlidesApiInfo
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://aspose-slides-cloud.p.rapidapi.com/slides/info"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aspose-slides-cloud.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://aspose-slides-cloud.p.rapidapi.com/slides/info"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aspose-slides-cloud.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GetSlideAnimation

optional_parameters.name: shapeIndex
optional_parameters.description: Shape index. If specified, only effects related to that shape are returned.

Accelerate.description: The percentage of duration accelerate behavior effect.

AutoReverse.description: True to automatically play the animation in reverse after playing it in the forward direction.

Decelerate.description: The percentage of duration decelerate behavior effect.

RepeatCount.description: The number of times the effect should repeat.

RepeatDuration.description: The number of times the effect should repeat.

Restart.description: The way for a effect to restart after complete.

Speed.description: The percentage by which to speed up (or slow down) the timing.

RepeatCount.description: The number of times the effect should repeat.

RepeatDuration.description: The number of times the effect should repeat.

Restart.description: The way for a effect to restart after complete.

Speed.description: The percentage by which to speed up (or slow down) the timing.

TriggerShapeIndex.description: Index of the shape that triggers the sequence.

NumberedBulletStartWith.description: Starting number for a numbered bullet.

HangingPunctuation.description: True if hanging punctuation is used with the paragraph.

EastAsianLineBreak.description: True if East Asian line break is used with the paragraph.

LatinLineBreak.description: True if Latin line break is used with the paragraph.

RightToLeft.description: True if right to left direction is used with the paragraph.

Escapement.description: Superscript or subscript of the text.

ProofDisabled.description: True if the text proof should be disabled.

SmartTagClean.description: True if smart tag should be cleaned.

Kumimoji.description: True if numbers should ignore East-Asian specific vertical text layout.

IsHardUnderlineFill.description: True if underline style has own FillFormat properties.

IsHardUnderlineLine.description: True if underline style has own LineFormat properties.

Grow.description: true if the bounds are grown

RotateShadowWithShape.description: true if the reflection should rotate with the shape when the shape is rotated
